Title: WPF Shape Demo
Description: This WPF application demos shape objects in WPF,such as Point,Rectangle,Polygon,Polyline and so on.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This WPF application demos shape objects in WPF,such as Point,Rectangle,Polygon,Polyline and so on.

In this demo application,what you draw is a basic shape of wpf,you can see what a polygon or polyline is made of.
I made this project mainly for the WPF for GIS,and do some research on how to use WPF objects to immplent a GIS app.
In future version I will add a feature that add SQLServer2008 Spitial support,and I will test more performance for that,of course,which is the most of important.
The purpose I made this demo app mainly for the idea of WPF+SQL2008 for a mini GIS system.



More information about this project please check author's blog from China:

http://aspnetx.cnblogs.com
